sentences.sContent: You first must create the buffer, fill it, then rewind the position to the beginning so you can read from the start.
sentences.sContent_eng: You first must create the buffer, fill it, then rewind the position to the beginning so you can read from the start.
sentences.sCn: 必须首先创建一个缓冲区，先填充它，然后将位置倒回起始点，这样才能从头读。

trans.tranOther: to make a  cassette  tape or  video  go backwards in order to see or hear it again
